feature_name: AI-Powered Smart Reply for Customer Support
problem_statement: Support agents spend 40% of their time writing repetitive responses to common customer questions, leading to slower response times and agent burnout
user_research_summary: Interviewed 15 support agents across 3 companies. Key findings: (1) 80% report feeling overwhelmed by ticket volume, (2) 65% say most questions are repetitive, (3) Agents want AI suggestions but need ability to customize, (4) Concern about losing personal touch with customers.
competitive_landscape: Zendesk and Intercom offer basic canned responses. Freshdesk has AI suggestions but low accuracy (60%). Opportunity to differentiate with higher accuracy (85%+) and contextual understanding.
technical_constraints: Must integrate with existing ticketing system (Zendesk API)
GDPR compliant (no customer PII in training data)

success_metrics.name: Average Response Time
success_metrics.measurement: Time from ticket creation to first response

success_metrics.name: Agent Productivity
success_metrics.measurement: Average tickets resolved per agent per day

success_metrics.name: Smart Reply Acceptance Rate
success_metrics.measurement: Percentage of AI suggestions accepted without modification

ai_ml_requirements.data_requirements: Minimum 50K historical support tickets with resolutions
